ANU.name: Asilata Bapat
interest: My research focuses on problems in representation theory and algebraic geometry.  I am most interested in the topology and geometry of algebraic varieties arising from representation theory. Specific topics of interest include perverse sheaves, quiver varieties, equivariant cohomology, and Bernstein--Sato polynomials.
ANU.biography: I received my PhD in June 2016 from the University of Chicago. Before coming to ANU, I was a postdoc at the University of Georgia.
